metadataAttributes.Title: Data Warehousing for Business Intelligence Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Harness Business Data . Build a fully-optimized business data warehouse in five courses.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Pentaho, Data Visualization (DataViz), Data Warehouse, SQL, Database (DB) Design, Entity–Relationship (E-R) Model, Database (DBMS), Extraction, Transformation And Loading (ETL), Data Integration, Data Warehousing, Materialized View, Business Intelligence,
